question: Which textile can be used for the construction of roads?
explanation:
Coir Geo textiles, a permeable fabric, natural, strong, highly durable, resistant to rots, moulds and moisture, free from any microbial attack, is accepted as a good material for rural road construction.
Coir Geo textiles will be used for construction of rural roads under the PMGSY-III as per the National Rural Infrastructure Development Agency under Union Ministry of Rural Development, Govt. of India.
